description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. "Welcome to the dungeon. Those (un)lucky few that are chosen, face great riches and great perils. Good luck!"  A randomly generated dungeon is created every time you play. Discover the dungeons many secrets and multiple outcomes. Do you have what it takes to survive the dungeon?
description.short: "Welcome to the dungeon. Those (un)lucky few that are chosen, face great riches and great perils. Good luck!"  A randomly generated dungeon is created every time you play. Discover the dungeons many secrets and multiple outcomes. Do you have what it takes to survive the dungeon?
